full_text: Page 1566 Good morning, Thank you. Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone --------- Original message --------- From: [redacted] @bop.gov Date: 7/28/19 7:49 AM (GMT-05:00) To: "Shirley V. Skipper-Scott" [redacted] @bop.gov Cc: [redacted] @bop.gov Subject: Fwd: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update >>> [redacted] 07/28/2019 07:49 >>> AW Skipper-Scott, Inmate Epstein seems psychologically stable. He complained that his right arm was numb and hanging earlier. Nurse [redacted] saw him. He again said his right arm still feels somewhat numb and he said he cannot make a fist with that hand. He also said he has numbness on his neck. I informed Nurse [redacted] . He stated the toilet in his cell was running for 45 minutes last night and he could not take the noise. He is going to try the toilet before going to legal today and if it does not shut off, he will be moved to another cell. Thanks, [redacted] > x [redacted] 7/28/2019 7:36 AM >>> Inmate [redacted] is being taken off of Psych Observation. Suicide Watch None Psych Observation 1. Epstein #76318-054 Pending Bedspace for SHU [redacted] Thank you, [redacted] Page 7272 DOJ-OGR-00025635

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email chain discussing the status of inmate Epstein, including his psychological stability and medical complaints. Multiple names and email addresses have been redacted.
